attributes.action: Initiate measures intended to reduce the seagull population of the United Kingdom
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Seagulls are a common pest.  They achieve absolutely no good, serve no purpose and are an unnecessary, and ever increasing, blight on our society.  It is about time the numbers of these 'vermin' are brought down, preferably to a negligible number.
